VRDisplayRequestPresent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The requestPresent() method of the interface starts the VRDisplay presenting a scene.

blockquote.para: Note: This method was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para:
-WebVR API homepage

VRDisplayRequestPresent.returns: A promise that resolves once the presentation has begun. There are a number of rules surrounding the promise's fulfillment or rejection:
